title: Typing Speed (Lowercase Only)
description: This test evaluates candidates’ typing speed in words per minute (WPM) by providing a randomly generated sequence of words separated by a space. This test contains only lowercase letters, without capitalization or punctuation.

title: 10-Key Typing (Decimals and Operators)
description: This 10-key typing test evaluates candidates’ ability to accurately and efficiently enter numerical data using all keys on a keyboard's numeric pad. This test measures the speed and accuracy of a person's data entry skills in keystrokes per hour (KPH).

title: 10-Key Typing (Numbers only)
description: This 10-key typing test evaluates candidates’ ability to accurately and efficiently enter numerical data using the ten keys on a keyboard's numeric pad. This test measures the speed and accuracy of a person's data entry skills in keystrokes per hour (KPH)

title: Typing Speed (Capitalization and Punctuation)
description: This test evaluates candidates’ typing speed in words per minute (WPM) by providing a randomly selected sequence of meaningful paragraphs. This test contains capitalization and punctuation.
